Testcase Scenario: Check if the speed in km is within the range 1-100, if not log an error.
Expected Output: Log message if the speed is in range

Testcase Scenario: (i) Check if the current speed exceeds threshold speed, if yes then convert kmph to mph. (ii) Form a message with this mph value. Send this message to Cloud communicator and expect a return code. (iii) Verify the return code if it's lesss than 400, if not log an error.
Inputs/Pre-condition: int currentSpeedInKmph, string message, expected return code range = 400
Expected Output: message created with mph value, error log if return code exceeds 400.

Testcase Scenario: Get current speed in kmph from BNF Speed Sensor
